Items.Title: The Public Advocate raps the gavel three times and states:
The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "Will the Clerk please read the call for today's Charter Meeting."

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Elizabeth Ryan to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as a member of the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the New York City Charter.

Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 101-A, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to childhood lead poisoning prevention, including the avoidance and remediation of lead-based paint hazards in housing and day care facilities, the repeal of local law number 38 for the year 1999 and the repeal of subdivision h of section 27-2013 and section 27-2126 of such code.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto of Int. No. 101A-2003 - Lead Poisoning Prevention

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 198-A, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation and implementation of an electronic death registration system.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto of Int. No. 198A-2003, Creation and implementation of an electronic death registration system.

Items.Title: The Commissioners of Elections at their meeting held today certified the November 4, 2003 General Election for Members of the City Council.
Items.ActionName: Rcvd, Ord, Prnt, Fld by Council
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Rcvd, Ord, Prnt, Fld by Council
Items.MatterName: BOARD OF ELECTIONS-LIST OF ELECTED CITY OFFICIALS

Items.Title: “I hereby nominate for the Office of the Speaker of the Council of the City of New York, Pursuant to Section 44 of the New York City Charter, for the term commencing January 1, 2004 and terminating December 31, 2005, Council Member Gifford Miller.”
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Approved, by Council

Items.Title: We the undersigned, duly elected Dennis Gallagher, Andrew Lanza, James Oddo, Minority Members of the Council of the City of New York, pursuant to Rule 4.10 of the Rules of the City Council of New York do hereby designate and appoint as Minority Leader of the City Council Member James Oddo, Borough of Staten Island for a term commencing January 1, 2004 and terminating December 31st, 2005.
Items.ActionName: Rcvd, Ord, Prnt, Fld by Council
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Rcvd, Ord, Prnt, Fld by Council

Items.Title: Continuation of 2002-2003 Rules of the Council, As Amended.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Approved, by Council
Items.MatterName: CONTINUATION OF 2002-2003 RULES OF THE COUNCIL

Items.Title: Nomination and Election of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Approved, by Council
Items.MatterName: NOMINATION AND ELECTION OF THE COMMITTEE ON RULES, PRIVILEGES AND ELECTIONS

Items.Title: The Public Advocate then states:
Items.AgendaNote: "Pursuant to Section 42 of the New York City Charter, I hereby call this meeting to order and direct the City Clerk and the Clerk of the Council to read the communication from the Board of Elections stating the list of elected City Council Members."
Items.MinutesNote: "Pursuant to Section 42 of the New York City Charter, I hereby call this meeting to order and direct the City Clerk and the Clerk of the Council to read the communication from the Board of Elections stating the list of elected City Council Members."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "I order the call to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."

Items.Title: Call For Charter Meeting
Items.ActionName: Rcvd, Ord, Prnt, Fld by Council

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "I order this communication to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate will state:
Items.AgendaNote: "Please rise for today's Invocation given by Rev. David Byron Cousin, Sr., Bridge Street AME Church, 277 Stuyvesant Avenue, Brooklyn, New York 11224.
Items.MinutesNote: "Please rise for today's Invocation given by Rev. David Byron Cousin, Sr., Bridge Street AME Church, 277 Stuyvesant Avenue, Brooklyn, New York 11224.

Items.Title: The Public Advocate will then requested:
Items.AgendaNote:
"Will the Clerk call the Roll for the purpose of ascertaining the presence of a quorum."   After ascertaining from the Clerk that there is a quorum, the Public Advocate will then announce:
"We have a quorum."
Items.MinutesNote:
"Will the Clerk call the Roll for the purpose of ascertaining the presence of a quorum."   After ascertaining from the Clerk that there is a quorum, the Public Advocate will then announce:
"We have a quorum."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate will then state:
Items.AgendaNote: "Will the City Clerk and Clerk of the Council perform the formal ceremony of the duly elected Council Members taking their oath of office."
Items.MinutesNote: "Will the City Clerk and Clerk of the Council perform the formal ceremony of the duly elected Council Members taking their oath of office."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate will recognized Council Member Vann.
Council Member Vann will make the motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record.
The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "If there are no objections, it is so ordered."
Items.MinutesNote: "If there are no objections, it is so ordered."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "Will the Clerk read the designation letter of Minority Leader."
Items.MinutesNote: "Will the Clerk read the designation letter of Minority Leader."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.AgendaNote: "This communication is to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."
Items.MinutesNote: "This communication is to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate will recognize the Speaker:
The Public Advocate will recognize the Speaker:
The Public Advocates states:
Items.MinutesNote: "Will the Clerk please read the call for today's Charter Meeting."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.MinutesNote: "I order the call to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."

Items.Title: The Public Advocate states:
Items.MinutesNote: "I order this communication to be Received, Ordered, Printed and Filed."
